Leaders in International Logistics from Bolivia

Since 1993, Trans Global LLC has established itself as a reliable benchmark in international logistics services from Bolivia. Our company is recognized for providing efficient multimodal transport solutions tailored to the needs of businesses engaged in global trade.

With over three decades of industry experience, we specialize in air, sea, and land freight transport, offering comprehensive support in customs procedures, storage, and supply chain coordination. Our clients value our punctuality, technical expertise, and commitment to personalized service.

Whether you manage import or export operations, are looking for a reliable logistics company in Bolivia, or need to coordinate complex supply chains, Trans Global provides the infrastructure and knowledge to make it happen—smoothly, safely, and professionally.

Our Main Logistics Services:

  • National and international transport logistics.
  • Cargo consolidation and deconsolidation.
  • International maritime, land, and air transport.
  • Customs procedures and documentation.
  • Local and last-mile delivery.
  • Secure storage services.
  • Comprehensive coordination of logistics projects.

Our Vision

We have made transport our vocation and our reason for being. Our vision is built on the professionalism of our team and a strong commitment to achieving the full satisfaction of our clients. We aspire to be recognized as a reliable strategic partner, guided by values that prioritize operational excellence, integrity, and continuous improvement.

Our Mission

To drive our clients’ commercial success through a logistics service that stands out for its speed, safety, reliability, and professional ethics. At Trans Global LLC, we approach every operation with responsibility and commitment, offering efficient solutions that strengthen the competitiveness of those who trust in us.

Quality Policies

At Trans Global LLC, we are firmly committed to the continuous improvement of our services, safeguarding our clients' interests within the framework of our partners’ guidelines and current regulations.

Our quality policy focuses on the strict fulfillment of agreements, efficient operational coordination, specialized technical knowledge, and fluid, ongoing communication among all involved parties.

We act with integrity, courtesy, and discipline, promoting a culture based on respect for the law, safety in every process, and a proactive attitude in all our actions.

Security Policies

At Trans Global LLC, we view security as a fundamental responsibility in managing both the information and goods entrusted to us by our clients, service operators, and collaborators.

Security is an integral part of all our logistics operations, and its enforcement is a shared commitment among every member of our organization. All team members are responsible for ensuring the effective application of the security guidelines established by our company, our partners, and the relevant national and international authorities.

Company Objectives

At Trans Global LLC, our main objective is to provide a fast, efficient, and reliable service that fully meets the expectations of our clients and partners, always upholding the highest standards of quality, ethics, and transparency in all our administrative and control processes.

We design customized logistics solutions with a global approach, capable of adapting and integrating effectively with the various services we offer, in order to meet the demands of international and regional trade.

We are honored to represent some of the world’s leading shipping lines and logistics companies, providing strategic services to and from Bolivia that reinforce our commitment to global connectivity and sustainable growth.

We are proud to work with the world’s leading shipping lines and global logistics companies, offering services to and from Bolivia!
